00018 void SGP_BortfeldTransportProtonL(      float*  E_initial_MeV,
00019                                                                         float*  sE_initial_MeV,
00020                                                                         float*  fluence_initial_cm2,
00021                                                                         char*   plateau_dose_material_name,
00022                                                                         long*   n_shielding_slabs,
00023                                                                         float*  shielding_thickness_m,
00024                                                                         char*   shielding_material_nameL,
00025                                                                         long*   n_detector_slabs,
00026                                                                         float*  detector_thickness_m,
00027                                                                         char*   detector_material_name,
00028                                                                         /* return values */
00029                                                                         float*  plateau_dose_Gy,
00030                                                                         float*  plateau_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00031                                                                         float*  detector_z_cm,
00032                                                                         float*  detector_E_MeV,
00033                                                                         float*  detector_sE_MeV,
00034                                                                         float*  detector_fluence_cm2,
00035                                                                         float*  detector_dfluencedz_cm,
00036                                                                         float*  detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00037                                                                         float*  detector_dose_Gy,
00038                                                                         float*  detector_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00039                                                                         float*  geom_factor)
00040 {
00041         // S/R and L cannot pass string arrays, therefore they send a string with ";" delimiters
00042         // that is taken apart here and fed in the actual routine
00043         char**  shielding_material_name;
00044         long    i;
00045         if(*n_shielding_slabs > 0){
00046                 shielding_material_name         = (char**)calloc(*n_shielding_slabs, sizeof(char*));
00047                 for (i = 0; i < *n_shielding_slabs; i++){
00048                         shielding_material_name[i]      = (char*)calloc(255, sizeof(char));
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 char    sep[]   = ";";
00052                 char*   token;
00053                 token   =       strtok( shielding_material_nameL, sep );
00054                 strcpy(shielding_material_name[0], token);
00055                 for (i = 1; i < *n_shielding_slabs; i++){
00056                         token                                           =       strtok( NULL, sep );
00057                         strcpy(shielding_material_name[i], token);
00058                 }
00059         }else{
00060                 char*   dummy;
00061                 shielding_material_name = &dummy;
00062         }
00063 
00064         SGP_BortfeldTransportProton(    E_initial_MeV,
00065                                                                         sE_initial_MeV,
00066                                                                         fluence_initial_cm2,
00067                                                                         plateau_dose_material_name,
00068                                                                         n_shielding_slabs,
00069                                                                         shielding_thickness_m,
00070                                                                         shielding_material_name,
00071                                                                         n_detector_slabs,
00072                                                                         detector_thickness_m,
00073                                                                         detector_material_name,
00074                                                                         /* return values */
00075                                                                         plateau_dose_Gy,
00076                                                                         plateau_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00077                                                                         detector_z_cm,
00078                                                                         detector_E_MeV,
00079                                                                         detector_sE_MeV,
00080                                                                         detector_fluence_cm2,
00081                                                                         detector_dfluencedz_cm,
00082                                                                         detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00083                                                                         detector_dose_Gy,
00084                                                                         detector_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00085                                                                         geom_factor);
00086 
00087         if(*n_shielding_slabs > 0){
00088                 for (i = 0; i < *n_shielding_slabs; i++){
00089                         free(shielding_material_name[i]);}
00090                 free(shielding_material_name);}
00091 };

00094 void SGP_BortfeldTransportProtonS(      float*  E_initial_MeV,
00095                                                                         float*  sE_initial_MeV,
00096                                                                         float*  fluence_initial_cm2,
00097                                                                         char**  plateau_dose_material_name,
00098                                                                         long*   n_shielding_slabs,
00099                                                                         float*  shielding_thickness_m,
00100                                                                         char**  shielding_material_name,
00101                                                                         long*   n_detector_slabs,
00102                                                                         float*  detector_thickness_m,
00103                                                                         char**  detector_material_name,
00104                                                                         /* return values */
00105                                                                         float*  plateau_dose_Gy,
00106                                                                         float*  plateau_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00107                                                                         float*  detector_z_cm,
00108                                                                         float*  detector_E_MeV,
00109                                                                         float*  detector_sE_MeV,
00110                                                                         float*  detector_fluence_cm2,
00111                                                                         float*  detector_dfluencedz_cm,
00112                                                                         float*  detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00113                                                                         float*  detector_dose_Gy,
00114                                                                         float*  detector_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00115                                                                         float*  geom_factor)
00116 {
00117         // S/R cannot pass string arrays, therefore n_shielding_slabs = 0 or 1
00118         SGP_BortfeldTransportProton(    E_initial_MeV,
00119                                                                         sE_initial_MeV,
00120                                                                         fluence_initial_cm2,
00121                                                                         *plateau_dose_material_name,
00122                                                                         n_shielding_slabs,
00123                                                                         shielding_thickness_m,
00124                                                                         shielding_material_name,
00125                                                                         n_detector_slabs,
00126                                                                         detector_thickness_m,
00127                                                                         *detector_material_name,
00128                                                                         /* return values */
00129                                                                         plateau_dose_Gy,
00130                                                                         plateau_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00131                                                                         detector_z_cm,
00132                                                                         detector_E_MeV,
00133                                                                         detector_sE_MeV,
00134                                                                         detector_fluence_cm2,
00135                                                                         detector_dfluencedz_cm,
00136                                                                         detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00137                                                                         detector_dose_Gy,
00138                                                                         detector_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00139                                                                         geom_factor);
00140 
00141 };
00142 
00143 void    SGP_Dose_Gy(    float*  density_g_cm3,
00144                                                 float*  fluence_cm2,
00145                                                 float*  LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00146                                                 float*  dfluencedz_cm,
00147                                                 float*  E_MeV,
00148                                                 float*  dose_Gy,
00149                                                 float*  dose_noNuc_Gy)
00150 {
00151         // Contribution of inelastic nuclear collision to dose (Berger, "Penetration of proton beam through water, 1993)
00152         float   gamma   =       0.6f;
00153         float   tmp             =       (*fluence_cm2) * (*LET_MeV_g_cm2);
00154         *dose_noNuc_Gy  =       tmp * MeV_to_J * g_cm3_to_kg_m3;
00155         tmp                             +=      gamma * (*dfluencedz_cm) * (*E_MeV) * (*density_g_cm3);
00156         *dose_Gy                =       tmp * MeV_to_J * g_cm3_to_kg_m3;
00157 }
00158 
00159 void SGP_BortfeldTransportProton(       float*  E_initial_MeV,
00160                                                                         float*  sE_initial_MeV,
00161                                                                         float*  fluence_initial_cm2,
00162                                                                         char*   plateau_dose_material_name,
00163                                                                         long*   n_shielding_slabs,
00164                                                                         float*  shielding_thickness_m,
00165                                                                         char**  shielding_material_name,
00166                                                                         long*   n_detector_slabs,
00167                                                                         float*  detector_thickness_m,
00168                                                                         char*   detector_material_name,
00169                                                                         /* return values */
00170                                                                         float*  plateau_dose_Gy,
00171                                                                         float*  plateau_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00172                                                                         float*  detector_z_cm,
00173                                                                         float*  detector_E_MeV,
00174                                                                         float*  detector_sE_MeV,
00175                                                                         float*  detector_fluence_cm2,
00176                                                                         float*  detector_dfluencedz_cm,
00177                                                                         float*  detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00178                                                                         float*  detector_dose_Gy,
00179                                                                         float*  detector_dose_noNuc_Gy,
00180                                                                         float*  geom_factor)
00181 {
00182         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00183         // The following code only works for protons
00184         // R(E) and S(E) are approximated by power laws
00185         // which is valid from 1 MeV - 200 MeV (Bortfeld, 1997)
00186 
00187         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00188         // GET DATA FOR MATERIALS INVOLVED
00189 
00190         long    i;
00191 
00192         long    nMaterials                              = *n_shielding_slabs + 2;                               // max. one material for each shielding slab + plateau material + detector
00193 
00194         float*  density_g_cm3                   = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00195         float*  electron_density_m3             = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00196         float*  I_eV                                    = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00197         float*  alpha_g_cm2_MeV                 = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00198         float*  alpha_cm_MeV                    = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00199         float*  p_MeV                                   = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00200         float*  m_g_cm2                                 = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00201         float*  m_cm                                    = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00202 
00203         float*  dsE2dz                                  = (float*)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(float));
00204 
00205         char**  materials                               = (char**)calloc(nMaterials, sizeof(char*));
00206         materials[0]                                    = plateau_dose_material_name;
00207         materials[1]                                    = detector_material_name;
00208         if (*n_shielding_slabs > 0){
00209                 for (i = 2; i < nMaterials; i++){
00210                         materials[i]                                    = shielding_material_name[i - 2];}
00211         }
00212 
00213         SGP_getMaterialData(    &nMaterials,
00214                                                         (long*)materials,
00215                                                         density_g_cm3,
00216                                                         electron_density_m3,
00217                                                         I_eV,
00218                                                         alpha_g_cm2_MeV,
00219                                                         p_MeV,
00220                                                         m_g_cm2);
00221 
00222         SGP_Bohr_Energy_Straggling_g_cm2(       &nMaterials,
00223                                                                                 materials,
00224                                                                                 dsE2dz);
00225 
00226         for (i = 0; i < nMaterials; i++){
00227                 alpha_cm_MeV[i]         =       alpha_g_cm2_MeV[i] / density_g_cm3[i];
00228                 m_cm[i]                         =       m_g_cm2[i] / density_g_cm3[i];
00229         }
00230 
00231         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00232         // PLATEAU DOSE
00233 
00234         float   R0_cm                                   = alpha_cm_MeV[0] * pow(*E_initial_MeV, p_MeV[0]);
00235         float   LET_MeV_g_cm2                   = 1.0f / (alpha_cm_MeV[0] * p_MeV[0]) * pow(*E_initial_MeV, 1.0f - p_MeV[0]) / density_g_cm3[0];
00236         // if fluence < 0 then dose given, so compute fluence
00237         if(*fluence_initial_cm2 < 0){
00238                 *fluence_initial_cm2                    = -1.0f * (*fluence_initial_cm2) / (LET_MeV_g_cm2 * MeV_to_J * g_cm3_to_kg_m3);}
00239         float   dfluencedz                              = (*fluence_initial_cm2) * m_cm[0] / (1 + m_cm[0] * R0_cm);
00240 
00241 
00242         SGP_Dose_Gy(    &density_g_cm3[0],
00243                                         fluence_initial_cm2,
00244                                         &LET_MeV_g_cm2,
00245                                         &dfluencedz,
00246                                         E_initial_MeV,
00247                                         // return
00248                                         plateau_dose_Gy,
00249                                         plateau_dose_noNuc_Gy);
00250 
00251 
00252         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00253         // TRANSPORT THROUGH SHIELDING SLABS
00254         float   E_MeV                   =       *E_initial_MeV;
00255         float   sE2_MeV2                =       (*sE_initial_MeV) * (*sE_initial_MeV);
00256         float   fluence_cm2             =       *fluence_initial_cm2;
00257 
00258         if (*n_shielding_slabs > 0){
00259                 for (i = 0; i < *n_shielding_slabs; i++){
00260                         // some conversions
00261                         long    k                               =       i + 2;                                  // pointer to material data in material list
00262                         float   dz_cm                   =       shielding_thickness_m[i] * m_to_cm;
00263                         R0_cm                                   =       alpha_cm_MeV[k] * pow(E_MeV, p_MeV[k]);
00264                         float   u                               =       R0_cm - dz_cm;
00265 
00266                         // Add energy straggling
00267                         sE2_MeV2                                =       dsE2dz[i] * dz_cm + sE2_MeV2 * sE2_MeV2;
00268 //  Is the beam stopped in the slab?
00269 //      ACCOUNT FOR STRAGGLING!
00270 //  this approach is only valid if slabs are far from Bragg peak!
00271 //      SGP_Funs(&z_cm, &range_cm, &sigma, &ni, &tmp);
00272                         if (u <= 0){
00273                                 E_MeV                   =       0.0f;
00274                                 fluence_cm2             =       0.0f;
00275                                 break;}
00276                         //      If not, get energy and fluence after passing the shielding slab
00277                         E_MeV                   =       1.0f / pow(alpha_cm_MeV[k], 1.0f / p_MeV[k]) * pow(u, 1.0f / p_MeV[k]);
00278                         fluence_cm2             *=      (1.0f + m_cm[k] * u) / (1.0f + m_cm[0] * R0_cm);
00279                 }
00280         }
00281 
00282         /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00283         // TRANSPORT THROUGH DETECTOR
00284 
00285         float   dz_cm                   =       (*detector_thickness_m / *n_detector_slabs) * m_to_cm;
00286         R0_cm                                   =       alpha_cm_MeV[1] * pow(E_MeV, p_MeV[1]);
00287 
00288         float   sz2_cm2                 =       dsE2dz[1] *                                                                                                                             // Bortfeld's s_mono
00289                                                                 p_MeV[1] * p_MeV[1] * pow(alpha_cm_MeV[1], 2.0 / p_MeV[1]) /
00290                                                                 (3.0 - 2.0 / p_MeV[1]) * pow(R0_cm, 3.0 - 2.0 / p_MeV[1]);
00291 
00292         float   sigma2_cm2              =       sz2_cm2 + sE2_MeV2      * pow(alpha_cm_MeV[1], 2)                                                       // Add straggling in detector and from slabs
00293                                                                                                         * pow(p_MeV[1], 2)                                                              // see Bortfeld, eq. 19
00294                                                                                                         * pow(E_MeV, 2 * p_MeV[1] - 2.0f);
00295 
00296 
00297         float   sigma_cm                =       sqrt(sigma2_cm2);
00298 
00299         *geom_factor                    =       0.0f;
00300 
00301         for (i = 0; i < *n_detector_slabs; i++){
00302 
00303                 detector_z_cm[i]                        =       dz_cm * (i + 0.5f);
00304 
00305                 float   tmp                                     =       0.0f;
00306 
00307                 // E incl. straggling
00308                 float   ni                                      =       1.0f / p_MeV[1];
00309                 SGP_Funs(&detector_z_cm[i], &R0_cm, &sigma_cm, &ni, &tmp);
00310                 detector_E_MeV[i]                       =       1.0f / pow(alpha_cm_MeV[1], ni) * tmp;
00311                 detector_sE_MeV[i]                      =       sqrt( sE2_MeV2 + pow(detector_z_cm[i] * dsE2dz[1], 2));
00312 
00313                 // L incl. straggling
00314                 ni                                                      =       1.0f / p_MeV[1] - 1.0f;
00315                 SGP_Funs(&detector_z_cm[i], &R0_cm, &sigma_cm, &ni, &tmp);
00316                 detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2[i]       =       1.0f / (p_MeV[1] * pow(alpha_cm_MeV[1], 1.0f / p_MeV[1])) * tmp / density_g_cm3[1];
00317 
00318                 // F incl. straggling
00319                 ni                                                      =       1.0f;
00320                 SGP_Funs(&detector_z_cm[i], &R0_cm, &sigma_cm, &ni, &tmp);
00321                 detector_fluence_cm2[i]         =       fluence_cm2 *  (1.0f + m_cm[1] * R0_cm) * (1.0f + m_cm[1] * tmp);
00322 
00323                 detector_dfluencedz_cm[i]       =       fluence_cm2 * m_cm[1] / (1.0f + m_cm[1] * R0_cm);
00324 
00325                 SGP_Dose_Gy(    &density_g_cm3[1],
00326                                                 &detector_fluence_cm2[i],
00327                                                 &detector_LET_MeV_g_cm2[i],
00328                                                 &detector_dfluencedz_cm[i],
00329                                                 &detector_E_MeV[i],
00330                                                 // return
00331                                                 &detector_dose_Gy[i],
00332                                                 &detector_dose_noNuc_Gy[i]);
00333 
00334                 *geom_factor                            +=      detector_dose_Gy[i];
00335         }
00336 
00337         *geom_factor                            /=      (*n_detector_slabs) * detector_dose_Gy[0];
00338 }
